results.title: Effect of lisinopril and isosorbide-5-mononitrate on hemodynamics and mortality in rats with permanent coronary artery occlusion.
results.text_hl: Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_isosorbide_5_mononitrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C030397 @@@isosorbide-5-mononitrate@@@ on hemodynamics and mortality in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with permanent @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054059 @@@coronary artery occlusion@@@.

citations.NLM: Riva E, Kurosaki M, Latini R. Effect of lisinopril and isosorbide-5-mononitrate on hemodynamics and mortality in rats with permanent coronary artery occlusion. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1992 Sep;20(3):490-5. PMID: 1279297
citations.BibTeX: @article{1279297, title={Effect of lisinopril and isosorbide-5-mononitrate on hemodynamics and mortality in rats with permanent coronary artery occlusion.}, author={Riva E and Kurosaki M and Latini R}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={20}, number={3}, pages={490-5}}

results.title: Early rather than delayed administration of lisinopril protects the heart after myocardial infarction in rats.
results.text_hl: METHODS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ (20 mg/kg/day) was given on day 1 or 21 days after @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054059 @@@coronary occlusion@@@ in small or large @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarctions@@@.

citations.NLM: Zornoff LA, Matsubara BB, Matsubara LS, Paiva SA, Spadaro J. Early rather than delayed administration of lisinopril protects the heart after myocardial infarction in rats. Basic Res Cardiol. 2000 Jun;95(3):208-14. PMID: 10879622
citations.BibTeX: @article{10879622, title={Early rather than delayed administration of lisinopril protects the heart after myocardial infarction in rats.}, author={Zornoff LA and Matsubara BB and Matsubara LS and Paiva SA and Spadaro J}, journal={Basic Res Cardiol}, volume={95}, number={3}, pages={208-14}}

results.title: Effects of lisinopril on experimental ischemia in rats. Influence of infarct size.
results.text_hl: METHODS - @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ (20 mg/kg/day) dissolved in drinking water was administered to @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ immediately after @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054059 @@@coronary artery occlusion@@@.

citations.NLM: Zornoff LA, Matsubara BB, Matsubara LS, Paiva SA, Tornero MT, Spadaro J. Effects of lisinopril on experimental ischemia in rats. Influence of infarct size. Arq Bras Cardiol. 1999 Oct;73(4):359-72. PMID: 10754590
citations.BibTeX: @article{10754590, title={Effects of lisinopril on experimental ischemia in rats. Influence of infarct size.}, author={Zornoff LA and Matsubara BB and Matsubara LS and Paiva SA and Tornero MT and Spadaro J}, journal={Arq Bras Cardiol}, volume={73}, number={4}, pages={359-72}}

results.title: Effects of an early treatment with lisinopril and isosorbide-5-mononitrate on hemodynamics and late ventricular remodelling in rats with 9-week myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_isosorbide_5_mononitrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C030397 @@@isosorbide-5-mononitrate@@@ or vehicle were given to @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ (n = 10-14 per group) immediately after @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054059 @@@coronary artery occlusion@@@ (by an intravenous bolus) and then for nine weeks (in drinking water).

citations.NLM: Riva E, Kurosaki M, Porzio S, Latini R, Lagrasta C, Olivetti G. Effects of an early treatment with lisinopril and isosorbide-5-mononitrate on hemodynamics and late ventricular remodelling in rats with 9-week myocardial infarction. Cardioscience. 1995 Jun;6(2):139-46. PMID: 7578911
citations.BibTeX: @article{7578911, title={Effects of an early treatment with lisinopril and isosorbide-5-mononitrate on hemodynamics and late ventricular remodelling in rats with 9-week myocardial infarction.}, author={Riva E and Kurosaki M and Porzio S and Latini R and Lagrasta C and Olivetti G}, journal={Cardioscience}, volume={6}, number={2}, pages={139-46}}
